hero.title: Your Trusted Halal Certification Authority
hero.subtitle: Connecting consumers with authentic Halal products and businesses through rigorous certification standards

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide comprehensive Halal certification services for businesses of all sizes.

certification.title: Halal Certification
certification.description: We offer comprehensive Halal certification for restaurants, food manufacturers, and other businesses.

inspection.title: On-site Inspections
inspection.description: Our qualified inspectors conduct thorough examinations to ensure compliance with Halal standards.

verification.title: Certificate Verification
verification.description: Easily verify the authenticity of Halal certification with our online verification system.

consultation.title: Consultation Services
consultation.description: We provide expert guidance on implementing Halal practices in your business operations.

process.title: Certification Process
process.description: Our streamlined process makes it easy to obtain Halal certification for your business.

step1.title: Application
step1.description: Submit your business details and required documentation through our online portal.

step2.title: Inspection
step2.description: Our trained inspectors will visit your facility to assess compliance with Halal standards.

step3.title: Certification
step3.description: Upon approval, receive your official Halal certificate and digital verification QR code.

step4.title: Monitoring
step4.description: Regular follow-up inspections ensure continued compliance with Halal requirements.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from businesses that have benefited from our Halal certification services.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our certification team consists of qualified Islamic scholars and food safety experts with extensive experience in Halal certification.

apply.title: Apply for Halal Certification
apply.description: Complete the following steps to apply for Halal certification for your business
apply.pageSubtitle: A simple step-by-step process towards becoming a certified Halal establishment
apply.step1Description: Provide your business details and information about your products and operations
apply.step2Description: Upload required documentation including supplier details and ingredient lists
apply.step3Description: Our inspectors will visit your establishment to verify compliance with Halal standards
apply.contactInformationDescription: Please provide the primary contact details for your business

form.title: Begin Your Application Now
form.subtitle: Please fill out all the required information below
form.successMessage: Your Halal certification application has been successfully submitted. We will contact you shortly.
form.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again.

operations.title: Operations Details
operations.productsDescription: List the main products or menu items you offer
operations.suppliersDescription: List your main suppliers and the materials they provide

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.uploadPrompt: Click to upload or drag and drop

confirmation.title: Review & Submit
confirmation.termsAccepted: I agree to the terms and conditions

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to upholding the highest standards of Halal certification, ensuring that consumers can confidently identify and access authentic Halal products and services.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted Halal certification authority worldwide, known for integrity, transparency, and commitment to Islamic dietary principles.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We maintain the highest standards of honesty and ethical conduct in all our operations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in our certification processes and customer service.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We ensure transparency in our certification procedures and decision-making.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: We take responsibility for our actions and decisions, ensuring they align with Islamic principles.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team consists of qualified Islamic scholars, food safety experts, and certification professionals with extensive experience in Halal certification.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Established in 2005, we have grown to become one of the most respected Halal certification authorities in the region, with a track record of integrity and excellence.

verify.title: Verify Certificate
verify.subtitle: Verify the authenticity of a Halal certification
verify.pageSubtitle: Check the authenticity and current status of any Halal certification
verify.description: Enter a certificate number or scan a QR code to verify the authenticity of a Halal certification
verify.scanQRDescription: Use your device camera to scan the QR code on the certificate
verify.searchDescription: Enter the certificate number or business name to verify certification
verify.searchPlaceholder: Enter certificate number or business name
verify.enterSearchTerm: Please enter a certificate number or business name to search
verify.noMatchingCertificate: No certificate found matching your search criteria
verify.searchError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
verify.invalidQRFormat: The scanned QR code is not a valid certificate format

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

info.title: Contact Information
info.address: 123 Halal Certification Way, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

questions.question: What is Halal certification?
questions.answer: Halal certification is a process that verifies that products and services meet Islamic dietary and production requirements.

questions.question: How long does the certification process take?
questions.answer: The certification process typically takes 4-6 weeks from application to approval, depending on the complexity of your business operations.

questions.question: How much does certification cost?
questions.answer: Certification costs vary based on business size, type, and complexity. Please contact us for a customized quote.
